meanings.definition: A person who chooses or selects something.
meanings.sent1: The chouser picked the best movie for us to watch.
meanings.sent2: She is the chouser in our group when it comes to deciding where to eat.
meanings.sent3: The chouser at the store accidentally grabbed two different flavors of ice cream.
meanings.sent4: Being a chouser in life means carefully selecting your path.
meanings.sent5: The chouser in the story always made the right decisions.

meanings.sent1: I will chouser the red shirt for the party.
meanings.sent2: She chousered the best route to avoid traffic.
meanings.sent3: He chousered the biggest slice of cake for himself.
meanings.sent4: Chousering the right words can make a big difference in a speech.
meanings.sent5: Make sure to chouser wisely before making a decision.
